name: Hog's Breath
description: Winner of the 2002 Cannabis Cup for best indica, Hog's breath was bred from Hindu Kush and Afghani in Tennessee. Her buds are light and dark green with orange hairs and a healthy amount of crystals on its dense buds. The taste has been described as cheddar and provides a overall tingly mind and body high. The THC content is up to 13% and CBD up to 0.47%.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Focused, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Nausea, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Headache
